sentences.sContent: Second, funds that mimic indexes will almost always have lower fees because of the passive investment strategy of managers of index funds.
sentences.sContent_eng: Second, funds that mimic indexes will almost always have lower fees because of the passive investment strategy of managers of index funds.
sentences.sCn: 第二，因为指数基金管理者的被动式投资策略，那些模仿指数的基金的运营费用总是更低廉。

synos.tran: 效颦者，模仿者；仿制品；小丑

remMethod.val: mimi(音似： 秘密) + c → 偷偷摸摸地模仿 → 模仿

words.tran: 模仿，模拟；（动物等）拟态伪装

trans.tranOther: to copy the way someone speaks or behaves, especially in order to make people laugh
